name: embellishment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something added to make another thing more beautiful or interesting, or the process of doing this: The architect was asked to add some sculptural embellishments to the building design. She's a no-nonsense actress whose beauty needs no Hollywood embellishment.

something added to or changed in a story, usually to make it more interesting or exciting, or the act of doing this: The news was given bluntly and plainly, without embellishments. He may be guilty of embellishment, but I believe the main point of his story is accurate. See
embellish
